name: Mikhael
skill: Recovers 2080/2480 HP for 3 allies (melee priority). Targets receive 45/53% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Restores HP to all allies at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of an archangel considered the greatest angel of them all. She takes actions for the good out of her faith in God, but things don't always work out the way she plans. This bothers her a lot, and sometimes things end up even worse than when they started. Still, she continues to reign supreme as an archangel thanks to her unparalleled effort and faith.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!" Event: Defeat LVL 80, 125, 175 Mikhael.
◦ "Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!" Event: Random drops start from LVL 1 and Event Summon.
◦ "Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!" Event: Get First half or Second half ranking of 1000 and above
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Increase damage dealt by 25% while battling Mikhael during the "Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!" event.

main: "May I interest you in a divine revelation?"
skill: "Let the word of the Lord resonate in your heart."
summon: "I pray for the happiness of all."
limit_break: "There are still more I must protect!"
